name: Shining Lives
description:
Something calls for help
Saying that your actions can bring change
Not everything is a lie
Fun is what matters

Game developed for Community Game Jam - 2019
Theme: "The Game Is A Liar"
The theme was used in the game narrative

How to play 🎮

• Move: A and D

• Jump: Space

• Shot: Mouse Click
